lead_paragraph: Receiver Reggie Wayne rejoined the Indianapolis Colts for practice yesterday and is expected to play Sunday against the Jets. Wayne flew to Louisiana on Sunday night after learning that his 32-year-old brother, Rashad, was killed in a traffic accident.
